## Matrix.getVectorIndex() method

Return this 1D vector position of a value given it's 2D matrix coordinates (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVectorIndex(x: number, y: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | the x coordinate in the matrix |
|  y | number | the y coordinate in the matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

- the corresponding possition in the vector ("`n`<!-- -->")
